title: Ticket #967: DAGMan lazy log file code should also index on device
description: Right now we consider log files unique if they have unique inode numbers -- so if a DAG has log files across multiple devices, it could happen that two distinct files have the same inode number. This would break the lazy log file reading code.
remarks:
2009-Nov-19 11:52:53 by wenger:
I'm fixing this as part of fixing gittrac #979. On Unix/Linux, the hash table is now indexed by a string that's a combination of devise and inode number.

2009-Nov-19 14:48:43 by wenger:
This is now fixed by the commit (4a3ff0c774a6fdf1e8f54aae5e0b591a5a73a05b) that (hopefully) fixed gittrac #979. (The fix will be in 7.4.1.)
